title: 7 For All Mankind Men's Luxe Performance Plus Slimmy Stretch Jean
description: Slim-fit silhouette crafted in Luxe Performance Plus denim.
Unmatched freedom of movement and an extremely soft feel.

Your favorite slim-fit silhouette crafted in Luxe Performance Plus denim. Expect unmatched freedom of movement and an extremely soft feel. A slim fit from hip to hem, giving a more tailored look. 7's Luxe Performance Plus denim offers a super stretch, and high recovery.
